Eric Santos (a mụrụ na 31 Jenụwarị 1972), bụ onye Angola-Portuguese na-eme ihe nkiri na onye edemede. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Scoundrel, The Compass, Jikulumessu na Kaminey.
Santos malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1996 na usoro telivishọn Praça da Alegria
Kemgbe ahụ, o sonyere n'egwuregwu, ihe nkiri, usoro, ihe nkiri ncha na Angola na Portuguese.
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke 'Cast 39', ụlọ ọrụ Talent nke dị na Portugal.
